title: Get BRAND-has-CAR MODEL Relationship by ID
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to be able to request the relationship between a BRAND and a CAR MODEL\
So I can find out if they are already connected or not
description:
* the requested relationship is returned when it actually exists â†’ status code `200`
  * requirements: the brand, the car model and the relationship between both nodes exist
  * response: a JSON containing the following relationship data:
    * `brand_id`: integer
    * `car_model_id`: integer
    * `relationship_id`: integer
    * `relationship_name`: string
    * `created_at`: string
    * `updated_at`: string
* the relationship retrieval fails with status code `404` when the provided data was not valid:
  * a `brand` with the given ID was not found
    * node with given ID exists, but is not a `brand`
  * a `car model` with the given ID was not found
    * node with given ID exists, but is not a `car model`
  * the relationship between both nodes was not found
